Package <Unnamed>

package
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    CardGame
    An interface for a general card game.
    CardGameUI
    An interface for a general card game user interface
    NetworkGame
     
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BigTwo
    The BigTwo class implements the CardGame interface and is used to model a Big Two card game.
    BigTwoCard
    It is the subclass of Card class which is used to model a card used in Big Two card game.It inherits all the methods from the Card class and overrides compareTo() method so that it can reflect the ordering of cards used in a Big Two card game.
    BigTwoClient
    The BigTwoClient class implements the NetworkGame interface.
    BigTwoDeck
    It is the subclass of Deck class which is used to model the deck of cards.
    BigTwoGUI
    This is BigTwoGUI class which builds a GUI for the game and handles all the user actions.
    BigTwoServer
    This class is used to model a Big Two card game server.
    Card
    This class is used for representing a card in general card games.
    CardGameMessage
    This class is used to model the message for a network card game.
    CardGamePlayer
    This class is used to represent a player in general card games.
    CardGameServer
    This class is used to model a card game server.
    CardList
    This class is used to represent a list of cards.
    Deck
    This class is used to represent a deck of cards in general card games.
    Flush
    The Flush class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    FullHouse
    The FullHouse class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    GameMessage
    This class is used to model the message for a network game.
    Hand
    The Hand class is a subclass of the CardList class.
    Pair
    The Pair class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    Quad
    The Quad class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    Single
    The Single class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    Straight
    The Single class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    StraightFlush
    The Single class is a subclass of the Hand class.
    Triple
    The Triple class is a subclass of the Hand class.
